title: Rattled
description: She enters the tattoo shop with an envelope full of memories and a heart filled with longing. What she leaves with is more than she dreamed of, and it just might be the first step to healing the wounds of the past.  Rattled is a short story and was originally published in the anthology "Forget Me Not: Charity Anthology Supporting Alzheimerâ€™s and Brain Health"  *** Recommended for adult readers only due to adult language.
author: Jane Charles
